meta.description: PATRYK.BARABACH - Precision-engineered roofing systems. Specialization: flat roofs, industrial, residential. Wroclaw, Poland & Netherlands.

og.title: PATRYK.BARABACH | Precision-Engineered Roofing Systems
og.description: Specialization: flat roofs, industrial, residential. 15 years of experience, 10-year warranty. Poland & Netherlands.

hero.subtitle: We combine roofing craftsmanship with engineering precision. Specializing in industrial facilities and modern residences.

a01.title: FLAT & INDUSTRIAL ROOFS
a01.desc: Specializing in large-scale flat roofs. Technologies: EPDM membranes, TPO/FPO, double-layer torch-on felt.

a02.title: PITCHED ROOFS & RESIDENCES
a02.desc: Complete truss and roofing solutions for single-family homes in the "Modern Barn" style.

a03.title: FACADES & CNC METALWORK
a03.desc: In-house CNC machinery. We manufacture precise flashings, sills, and modern ventilated facades.

p01.title: SITE SURVEY
p01.desc: Free on-site consultation. Roof measurement by drone or traditional methods. Technical condition analysis and photo documentation.

p02.title: QUOTATION
p02.desc: Detailed quote within 24h. Transparent breakdown of materials and labor. Budget options available.

p03.title: EXECUTION
p03.desc: Timely completion with documentation. Daily progress reports. Quality control at every stage.

p04.title: WARRANTY
p04.desc: 120-month written warranty. Free service inspections. Quick response to claims.

kontakt.subtitle: Whether you have a ready project or are just planning — get in touch. Free consultation and quote within 24h.
